title: Account Compromised Ticket #23734417
body:
I had my account stolen last Friday, and I'm still waiting can someone from Riot update me please? 
My ticket number is #23734417.

replies.body: I confirmed that your ticket was received on Friday.  It's since been escalated to our account team who will review this and help you out individually.  It may be a bit until you hear a response depending on the size of the queue, but hang tight!  Don't reply to the ticket until you receive a response, or you may return to the bottom of the queue.  We'll investigate this, and get back to you as soon as we can!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7txfAxAd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-18T16:39:31.838+0000)
>
> I confirmed that your ticket was received on Friday.  It's since been escalated to our account team who will review this and help you out individually.  It may be a bit until you hear a response depending on the size of the queue, but hang tight!  Don't reply to the ticket until you receive a response, or you may return to the bottom of the queue.  We'll investigate this, and get back to you as soon as we can!

Ok thank you, thought I was forgotten lol. I made a new account to play on for the mean time.
